boardgame.description: From Eagle Games website:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Age of Mythology, the tremendously popular real-time strategy game from Ensemble Studios and Microsoft, gets the Eagle Games treatment!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players control armies made up of warriors, priests, heroes, and mythical creatures from ancient Greek, Egyptian, and Norse mythology. They gather resources, which allow them to create buildings and armies. Special buildings are required to allow players to build new army types and improve the abilities of their units. Battles are resolved with a unique dice and card system that keeps the action moving. You get all the fast-paced action of a real-time game, with real 3-D pieces, and face-to-face gameplay!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The ultimate real-time strategy game jumps off the screen and onto your tabletop!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A game of epic proportions..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Age of Mythology, you will:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Explore the world, claiming production sites (farms, gold mines, lumber camps, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; temples)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Gather resources_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Build structures that give you advantages in production or battle_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Recruit armies of mortal warriors, mythic creatures, and heroes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Face off against other cultures in epic battles_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Age of Mythology: The Boardgame – 5-6 Player Expansion
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Arcade Castle: Episode 03 - Age of Mythology: The Board Game

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Age of Mythology (Eagle Games) This game is brand new and sealed. S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H through UPS Ground is $8.50 in the 48 states (includes tracking _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; insurance). We can combine shipping on multiple purchases. We collect 8.25% sales tax for TX orders. For more games go to www.NewSpiel.com.

Age of Mythology: The Boardgame - Brand NEW, Factory SEALED Eagle Games Outstanding new offering from Eagle Games is addictively fun! Includes over 300 great quality miniatures in 38 unique styles, and cards _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; boards with awesome artwork. Add the hottest new game, Age of Mythology The Boardgame, to your collection for your group_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s next gaming session. Also makes a wonderful gift! Buy it now for $37.00 USD plus $12.00 S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H (UPS, insured) within continental US. Will ship when payment clears. Contact me for shipping rates to other countries. I specialize in out-of-print and hard-to-find games. Be sure to check out all my other games available through the BoardGameGeek Marketplace!

Age of Mythology (Eagle Games) This game is brand new and sealed. S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;H through FedEx Ground is $8.50 in the 48 states (includes tracking _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; insurance). We can combine shipping on multiple purchases. We collect 7.75% sales tax for CA orders. For more games go to www.newspiel.com.
Has been opened and the miniatures removed from the sprues. Unplayed.

Shrink-wrap removed; otherwise, everything is unpunched and pieces are not separated from their frames. NOTE: I offer a 10% discount if you buy more than one of my listed _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;for sale_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; games.
Only played twice. Excellent condition.
Brand new, in shrink.
Opened, one set of figures separated, otherwise the rest of figures still attached. Counters punched but completely unplayed condition.
Only played twice; otherwise like new. You get all the figures cut from their sprues and bagged. That took a while, let me tell you. :) This is a heavy game, so shipping is more than usual.
Played once. All parts removed from sprues and bagged. Game is in fantastic condition!

Game is missing the following pieces: Egyptian peasant pieces in one color. All other sets are complete. No other pieces are damaged or missing. Game is still perfectly playable with 2 to 4 players _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; additional pieces are available from Eagle Games.
Still in Shrink Wrap!
new in shrink If you pay with a personal check then I will wait 10 business days before shipping.
In excellent shape.
Punched and bagged. Played once.

-played two times -all pieces were cleanly cut and placed in separate baggies. -great condition See my other items. Spring cleaning of games... Cheap prices... I will pay all shipping if you purchase 3+ games.
New in shrinkwrap.
Partially punched but never played (all cards still in shrink). If you have any questions (shipping, pics, etc.) just email me at danger-mouse@comcast.net.
Opened but never punched out.
Bought this game, played it once and did not care for it. My loss is your gain.

Game is complete. Tiles and miniatures are punched. Contains two sets of tiles. The original tiles were not glued properly. Eagle games sent me a replacement set. Box and components have only minor wear from one play. Buyer will send me their address and I will send them the actual shipping cost. I will ship within two business days after receiving payment. Thank you, Andy
Shrinkwrap removed, everything else untouched. UK shipping will be £6.00. Too heavy to ship outside UK really.
Opened but never played. If paying through PayPal, I cannot accept Credit Card or Debit Card orders. I ship the day I receive payment.

Actually, I would say it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s better than _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;acceptable_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;, as it only MIGHT be missing one Norse villager (I seem to remember a knife accident removing them from the sprues). I should also mention that a few of the goddesses on the cards and box have been given some clothes (you won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s marker unless you look close). Everything else is in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;very good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; condition; I would give this as a gift (and may still). Proceeds from this sale go to charity (Voice of the Martyrs).
Still in Shrinkwrap, very nice!

Unwrapped, but unpunched. Box lid has small vertical slice on top (someone trying to uncarefully cut the shrinkwrap is my guess) - noticeable but doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t affect box integrity. All bits are unpunched, still bagged, etc. Nice!

Brand new, in shrink. There are 2 small spots where the shrink wrap is torn, but there is no box damage underneath. Shipping cost is roughly the cost for a 5.5 lb package from 48104 to your zip code via USPS (Priority or Parcel) or FedEx Ground.

BRANDNEW: I´m offering this big-box.game in mint condition! All games come from a private collection! Please contact me if you´re looking for more interesting German games as I can offer a lot more. Buyer pays postage, so ask before buying to determine the weight of your desired games! The following payments are welcome: (1) Cash in a registered letter (only Euro accepted) or (2) Chargefree EU Bank-Transfer (using IBAN and SWIFT) or (3) Moneybookers.com (it´s as fast and safe as PayPal but much cheaper: maximum fee is 0.50 EUR) or (4) PayPal (for PayPal payment please add +5 % of the total sum). Have fun playing, Flix! --------------------------------------------- NEW SHIPPING CONDITIONS TO US! PLEASE READ!! --------------------------------------------- I have now the possibility to send parcels to the US through a friend of mine who is US Army member in Germany. + Cheaper shipping (13,90 EURO for Priority Mail) + including insurance + Much faster delivery (USPS Airmail) = More satisfaction Regular SHIPPING with DHL (=German Post): -------------------------------------------------------- _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; up to 1000 g without insurance (e.g. small cardgames): Europe: EUR 8,00 US/Canada: EUR 13,90 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; up to 2000 g without insurance: Germany: EUR 4,30 EU: EUR 10,00 US/Canada/Rest of Europe: EUR 15,00 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; up to 5 kg with insurance Germany: EUR 7,00 Europe: EUR 19,00 - 32,00 (depending on country) US/Canada: EUR 34,00

counted, punched and zip-bagged, but never played +++++ english version ++++++++++ will be shipped insured +++++ international payment : paypal OR direct bank to bank transfer (wich is cost-free inside european union by the way) OR cash (in a registered letter, exchanged into euros already) +++++ payment for germany : paypal OR personal pick up in berlin OR direct bank to bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! ++++++++++ international buyers beware : though german postal is relatively fast, they sadly aren´t cheap. it costs bewteen 19 - 37 euros for parcels up to a weight of 5 kg (= about 4 big boxed boardgames). price depends on where the package has to be shipped, so please ask for prices, before you hit the buy button ! +++++ insured shipment inside germany costs 8 euros
